text: Antonio Pennacchi (26 January 1950 â€“ 3 August 2021) was an Italian writer. He was born in Latina, Lazio. He won the 2010 Strega Prize for his novel, Canale Mussolini. He also wrote Il fasciocomunista. Pennacchi died on 3 August 2021 in Milan from a heart attack, aged 71.E' morto Antonio Pennacchi, premio Strega con Canale Mussolini ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Italian writers
